concept.description: Labels all .ui packages packages as LAYER and UI.
Labels all .logic packages packages as LAYER and LOGIC.
Labels all .persistence packages packages as LAYER and PERSISTENCE.

constraint.description: Packages in layer UI must have only dependencies to classes in layer UI, LOGIC or PERSISTENCE.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (package:PACKAGE:LAYER:UI)-[:CONTAINS*]->(classFieldOrMethod)-[:IMPLEMENTS|EXTENDS|THROWS|DEPENDS_ON]->(dependency:CLASS), (dependencyPackage:PACKAGE:LAYER)-[:CONTAINS*]->(dependency) WHERE NOT ( dependencyPackage:UI OR dependencyPackage:LOGIC OR dependencyPackage:PERSISTENCE ) RETURN classFieldOrMethod.FQN AS element, dependencyPackage.FQN AS dependency

constraint.description: Packages in layer Logic must have only dependencies to classes in layer LOGIC or PERSISTENCE.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (package:PACKAGE:LAYER:LOGIC)-[:CONTAINS*]->(classFieldOrMethod)-[:IMPLEMENTS|EXTENDS|THROWS|DEPENDS_ON]->(dependency:CLASS), (dependencyPackage:PACKAGE:LAYER)-[:CONTAINS*]->(dependency) WHERE NOT ( dependencyPackage:LOGIC OR dependencyPackage:PERSISTENCE ) RETURN classFieldOrMethod.FQN AS element, dependencyPackage.FQN AS dependency

constraint.description: Packages in layer Persistence must have only dependencies to classes in layer PERSISTENCE.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (package:PACKAGE:LAYER:PERSISTENCE)-[:CONTAINS*]->(classFieldOrMethod)-[:IMPLEMENTS|EXTENDS|THROWS|DEPENDS_ON]->(dependency:CLASS), (dependencyPackage:PACKAGE:LAYER)-[:CONTAINS*]->(dependency) WHERE NOT ( dependencyPackage:PERSISTENCE ) RETURN classFieldOrMethod.FQN AS element, dependencyPackage.FQN AS dependency
